parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

	
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the armor (or health for men) state of the vehicle (a value from 0 to 1). 

Works like [[setDamage]] only in reverse: ''player setVehicleArmor 1'' is the same as ''player setDamage 0'', and ''player setVehicleArmor 0'' is the same as ''player setDamage 0.97''

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  vehicleName '''setVehicleArmor''' value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] range 0 to 1

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setVehicleArmor]] 0.5;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setDamage]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
